verses.verse: ALEPH <WH835>. Blessed are they that are perfect <WH8549> in the way <WH1870>, Who walk <WH1980> in the law <WH8451> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH5341> his testimonies <WH5713>, That seek <WH1875> him with the whole heart <WH3820>.
Yea <WH6466>, they do no unrighteousness <WH5766>; They walk <WH1980> in his ways <WH1870>.
Thou hast commanded <WH6680> us thy precepts <WH6490>, That we should observe <WH8104> them diligently <WH3966>.
Oh that <WH305> my ways <WH1870> were established <WH3559> To observe <WH8104> thy statutes <WH2706>!
Then shall I not be put to shame <WH954>, When I have respect <WH5027> unto all thy commandments <WH4687>.
I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee with uprightness <WH3476> of heart <WH3824>, When I learn <WH3925> thy righteous <WH6664> judgments <WH4941>.
I will observe <WH8104> thy statutes <WH2706>: Oh forsake <WH5800> me not utterly <WH3966>.
BETH <WH5288>. Wherewith shall a young man cleanse <WH2135> his way <WH734>? By taking heed <WH8104> thereto according to thy word <WH1697>.
With my whole heart <WH3820> have I sought <WH1875> thee <WH7686>: Oh let me not wander from thy commandments <WH4687>.
Thy word <WH565> have I laid <WH6845> up in my heart <WH3820>, That I might not sin against thee <WH2398>.
Blessed <WH1288> art thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah: Teach <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
With my lips <WH8193> have I declared <WH5608> All the ordinances <WH4941> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
I have rejoiced <WH7797> in the way <WH1870> of thy testimonies <WH5715>, As much as in <WH5921> all riches <WH1952>.
I will meditate <WH7878> on thy precepts <WH6490>, And have respect <WH5027> unto thy ways <WH734>.
I will delight <WH8173> myself in thy statutes <WH2708>: I will not forget <WH7911> thy word <WH1697>.
GIMEL <WH1580>. Deal bountifully with thy servant <WH5650>, that I may live <WH2421>; So will I observe <WH8104> thy word <WH1697>.
Open <WH1540> thou mine eyes <WH5869>, that I may behold <WH5027> Wondrous things <WH6381> out of thy law <WH8451>.
I am a sojourner <WH1616> in the earth <WH776>: Hide <WH5641> not thy commandments from me <WH4687>.
My soul <WH5315> breaketh <WH1638> for the longing <WH8375> That it hath unto thine ordinances <WH4941> at all times <WH6256>.
Thou hast rebuked <WH1605> the proud <WH2086> that are cursed <WH779>, That do wander <WH7686> from thy commandments <WH4687>.
Take <WH1556> away from me reproach <WH2781> and contempt <WH937>; For I have kept <WH5341> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
Princes <WH8269> also sat <WH3427> and talked <WH1696> against me <WH5650>; But thy servant did meditate <WH7878> on thy statutes <WH2706>.
Thy testimonies <WH5713> also are my delight <WH8191> And my counsellors <WH582>.
DALETH <WH5315>. My soul cleaveth <WH1692> unto the dust <WH6083>: Quicken <WH2421> thou me according to thy word <WH1697>.
I declared <WH5608> my ways <WH1870>, and thou answeredst <WH6030> me <WH3925>: Teach me thy statutes <WH2706>.
Make me to understand <WH995> the way <WH1870> of thy precepts <WH6490>: So shall I meditate <WH7878> on thy wondrous works <WH6381>.
My soul <WH5315> melteth <WH1811> for heaviness <WH8424>: Strengthen <WH6965> thou me according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Remove <WH5493> from me the way <WH1870> of falsehood <WH8267>; And grant me thy law <WH8451> graciously <WH2603>.
I have chosen <WH977> the way <WH1870> of faithfulness <WH530>: Thine ordinances <WH4941> have I set before me <WH7737>.
I cleave <WH1692> unto thy testimonies <WH5715>: O Jehovah <WH3068>, put me not to shame <WH954>.
I will run <WH7323> the way <WH1870> of thy commandments <WH4687>, When thou shalt enlarge <WH7337> my heart <WH3820>.
HE <WH3384>. Teach me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, the way <WH1870> of thy statutes <WH2706>; And I shall keep <WH5341> it unto the end <WH6118>.
Give me understanding <WH995>, and I shall keep <WH5341> thy law <WH8451>; Yea <WH8104>, I shall observe it with my whole heart <WH3820>.
Make me to go <WH1869> in the path <WH5410> of thy commandments <WH4687>; For therein do I delight <WH2654>.
Incline <WH5186> my heart <WH3820> unto thy testimonies <WH5715>, And not to covetousness <WH1215>.
Turn away <WH5674> mine eyes <WH5869> from beholding <WH7200> vanity <WH7723>, And quicken <WH2421> me in thy ways <WH1870>.
Confirm <WH6965> unto thy servant <WH5650> thy word <WH565>, Which is in order unto the fear of thee <WH3374>.
Turn away <WH5674> my reproach <WH2781> whereof I am afraid <WH3025>; For thine ordinances <WH4941> are good <WH2896>.
Behold <WH8373>, I have longed after thy precepts <WH6490>: Quicken <WH2421> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>.
VAV <WH2617>. Let thy lovingkindnesses also come <WH935> unto me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, Even thy salvation <WH8668>, according to thy word <WH565>.
So shall I have <WH1697> an answer <WH6030> for him that reproacheth <WH2778> me <WH982>; For I trust in thy word <WH1697>.
And take <WH5337> not the word <WH1697> of truth <WH571> utterly <WH3966> out of my mouth <WH6310>; For I have hoped <WH3176> in thine ordinances <WH4941>.
So shall I observe <WH8104> thy law <WH8451> continually <WH8548> For ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
And I shall walk <WH1980> at liberty <WH7342>; For I have sought <WH1875> thy precepts <WH6490>.
I will also speak <WH1696> of thy testimonies <WH5713> before kings <WH4428>, And shall not be put to shame <WH954>.
And I will delight <WH8173> myself in thy commandments <WH4687>, Which I have loved <WH157>.
I will lift up <WH5375> my hands <WH3709> also unto thy commandments <WH4687>, which I have loved <WH157>; And I will meditate <WH7878> on thy statutes <WH2706>.
ZAYIN <WH2142>. Remember the word <WH1697> unto thy servant <WH5650>, Because thou hast made me to hope <WH3176>.
This is my comfort <WH5165> in my affliction <WH6040>; For thy word <WH565> hath quickened me <WH2421>.
The proud <WH2086> have had me greatly <WH3966> in derision <WH3887>: Yet have I not swerved <WH5186> from thy law <WH8451>.
I have remembered <WH2142> thine ordinances <WH4941> of old <WH5769>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, And have comforted myself <WH5162>.
Hot indignation <WH2152> hath taken hold <WH270> upon me <WH7563>, Because of the wicked that forsake <WH5800> thy law <WH8451>.
Thy statutes <WH2706> have been my songs <WH2158> In the house <WH1004> of my pilgrimage <WH4033>.
I have remembered <WH2142> thy name <WH8034>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, in the night <WH3915>, And have observed <WH8104> thy law <WH8451>.
This I have had <WH5341>, Because I have kept thy precepts <WH6490>.
HHETH <WH3068>. Jehovah is my portion <WH2506>: I have said <WH559> that I would observe <WH8104> thy words <WH1697>.
I entreated <WH2470> thy favor <WH6440> with my whole heart <WH3820>: Be merciful <WH2603> unto me according to thy word <WH565>.
I thought <WH2803> on my ways <WH1870>, And turned <WH7725> my feet <WH7272> unto thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I made haste <WH2363>, and delayed <WH4102> not <WH8104>, To observe thy commandments <WH4687>.
The cords <WH2256> of the wicked <WH7563> have wrapped <WH5749> me round <WH7911>; But I have not forgotten thy law <WH8451>.
At midnight <WH2676> I will rise <WH6965> to give thanks <WH3034> unto thee Because of thy righteous <WH6664> ordinances <WH4941>.
I am a companion <WH2270> of all them that fear <WH3372> thee <WH8104>, And of them that observe thy precepts <WH6490>.
The earth <WH776>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, is full <WH4390> of thy lovingkindness <WH2617>: Teach <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
TETH <WH6213>. Thou hast dealt well <WH2896> with thy servant <WH5650>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Teach <WH3925> me good <WH2898> judgment <WH2940> and knowledge <WH1847>; For I have believed <WH539> in thy commandments <WH4687>.
Before I was afflicted <WH6031> I went astray <WH7683>; But now I observe <WH8104> thy word <WH565>.
Thou art good <WH2896>, and doest good <WH2895>; Teach <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
The proud <WH2086> have forged <WH2950> a lie <WH8267> against me <WH3820>: With my whole heart will I keep <WH5341> thy precepts <WH6490>.
Their heart <WH3820> is as fat <WH2954> as grease <WH2459>; But I delight <WH8173> in thy law <WH8451>.
It is good <WH2896> for me that I have been afflicted <WH6031>; That I may learn <WH3925> thy statutes <WH2706>.
The law <WH8451> of thy mouth <WH6310> is better <WH2896> unto me Than thousands <WH505> of gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>.
YODH <WH3027>. Thy hands have made <WH6213> me and fashioned <WH6213> me <WH995>: Give me understanding, that I may learn <WH3925> thy commandments <WH4687>.
They that fear <WH3373> thee shall see <WH7200> me and be glad <WH8055>, Because I have hoped <WH3176> in thy word <WH1697>.
I know <WH3045>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, that thy judgments <WH4941> are righteous <WH6664>, And that in faithfulness <WH530> thou hast afflicted me <WH6031>.
Let <WH2617>, I pray thee, thy lovingkindness be for my comfort <WH5162>, According to thy word <WH565> unto thy servant <WH5650>.
Let thy tender mercies <WH7356> come <WH935> unto me <WH2421>, that I may live; For thy law <WH8451> is my delight <WH8191>.
Let the proud <WH2086> be put to shame <WH954>; For they have overthrown <WH5791> me wrongfully <WH8267>: But I will meditate <WH7878> on thy precepts <WH6490>.
Let those that fear <WH3373> thee turn <WH7725> unto me <WH3045>; And they shall know thy testimonies <WH5713>.
Let my heart <WH3820> be perfect <WH8549> in thy statutes <WH2706>, That I be not put to shame <WH954>.
KAPH <WH5315>. My soul fainteth <WH3615> for thy salvation <WH8668>; But I hope <WH3176> in thy word <WH1697>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> for thy word <WH565>, While I say <WH559>, When wilt thou comfort me <WH5162>?
For I am become like a wine-skin <WH4997> in the smoke <WH7008>; Yet do I not forget <WH7911> thy statutes <WH2706>.
How many are the days <WH3117> of thy servant <WH5650>? When wilt thou execute <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> on them that persecute me <WH7291>?
The proud <WH2086> have digged <WH3738> pits <WH7882> for me <WH8451>, Who are not according to thy law.
All thy commandments <WH4687> are faithful <WH530>: They persecute <WH7291> me wrongfully <WH8267>; Help thou me <WH5826>.
They had almost <WH4592> consumed <WH3615> me upon earth <WH776>; But I forsook <WH5800> not thy precepts <WH6490>.
Quicken <WH2421> me after thy lovingkindness <WH2617>; So shall I observe <WH8104> the testimony <WH5715> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
LAMEDH <WH5769>. For ever, O Jehovah <WH3068>, Thy word <WH1697> is settled <WH5324> in heaven <WH8064>.
Thy faithfulness <WH530> is unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>: Thou hast established <WH3559> the earth <WH776>, and it abideth <WH5975>.
They abide <WH5975> this day <WH3117> according to thine ordinances <WH4941>; For all things are thy servants <WH5650>.
Unless <WH3884> thy law <WH8451> had been my delight <WH8191>, I should then have perished <WH6> in mine affliction <WH6040>.
I will never <WH5769> forget <WH7911> thy precepts <WH6490>; For with them thou hast quickened me <WH2421>.
I am thine <WH3467>, save me <WH1875>; For I have sought thy precepts <WH6490>.
The wicked <WH7563> have waited <WH6960> for me <WH6>, to destroy me <WH995>; But I will consider thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I have seen <WH7200> an end <WH7093> of all perfection <WH8502>; But thy commandment <WH4687> is exceeding <WH3966> broad <WH7342>.
MEM <WH157>. Oh how love I thy law <WH8451>! It is my meditation <WH7881> all the day <WH3117>.
Thy commandments <WH4687> make me wiser <WH2449> than mine enemies <WH341>; For they are ever with me <WH5769>.
I have more understanding <WH7919> than all my teachers <WH3925>; For thy testimonies <WH5715> are my meditation <WH7881>.
I understand <WH995> more than the aged <WH2205>, Because I have kept <WH5341> thy precepts <WH6490>.
I have refrained <WH3607> my feet <WH7272> from every evil <WH7451> way <WH734>, That I might observe <WH8104> thy word <WH1697>.
I have not turned <WH5493> aside from thine ordinances <WH4941>; For thou hast taught me <WH3384>.
How sweet <WH4452> are thy words <WH565> unto my taste <WH2441>! Yea <WH1706>, sweeter than honey to my mouth <WH6310>!
Through thy precepts <WH6490> I get understanding <WH995>: Therefore I hate <WH8130> every false <WH8267> way <WH734>.
NUN <WH1697>. Thy word is a lamp <WH5216> unto my feet <WH7272>, And light <WH216> unto my path <WH5410>.
I have sworn <WH7650>, and have confirmed <WH6965> it <WH8104>, That I will observe thy righteous <WH6664> ordinances <WH4941>.
I am afflicted <WH6031> very much <WH3966>: Quicken <WH2421> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Accept <WH7521>, I beseech thee <WH5071>, the freewill-offerings of my mouth <WH6310>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, And teach <WH3925> me thine ordinances <WH4941>.
My soul <WH5315> is continually <WH8548> in my hand <WH3709>; Yet do I not forget <WH7911> thy law <WH8451>.
The wicked <WH7563> have laid <WH5414> a snare <WH6341> for me <WH8582>; Yet have I not gone astray from thy precepts <WH6490>.
Thy testimonies <WH5715> have I taken as a heritage <WH5157> for ever <WH5769>; For they are the rejoicing <WH8342> of my heart <WH3820>.
I have inclined <WH5186> my heart <WH3820> to perform <WH6213> thy statutes <WH2706> For ever <WH6118>, even unto the end.
SAMEKH <WH8130>. I hate them that are of a double mind <WH5588>; But thy law <WH8451> do I love <WH157>.
Thou art my hiding-place <WH5643> and my shield <WH4043>: I hope <WH3176> in thy word <WH1697>.
Depart <WH5493> from me <WH7489>, ye evil-doers, That I may keep <WH5341> the commandments <WH4687> of my God <WH430>.
Uphold <WH5564> me according unto thy word <WH565>, that I may live <WH2421>; And let me not be ashamed <WH954> of my hope <WH7664>.
Hold thou me up <WH5582>, and I shall be safe <WH3467>, And shall have respect <WH8159> unto thy statutes <WH2706> continually <WH8548>.
Thou hast set at nought <WH5541> all them that err <WH7686> from thy statutes <WH2706>; For their deceit <WH8649> is falsehood <WH8267>.
Thou puttest away <WH7673> all the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> like dross <WH5509>: Therefore I love <WH157> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
My flesh <WH1320> trembleth <WH5568> for fear <WH6343> of thee <WH3372>; And I am afraid of thy judgments <WH4941>.
AYIN <WH6213>. I have done justice <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6664>: Leave <WH3240> me not to mine oppressors <WH6231>.
Be surety <WH6148> for thy servant <WH5650> for good <WH2896>: Let not the proud <WH2086> oppress me <WH6231>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> for thy salvation <WH3444>, And for thy righteous <WH6664> word <WH565>.
Deal <WH6213> with thy servant <WH5650> according unto thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, And teach <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
I am thy servant <WH5650>; Give me understanding <WH995>, That I may know <WH3045> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
It is time <WH6256> for Jehovah <WH3068> to work <WH6213>; For they have made void <WH6565> thy law <WH8451>.
Therefore I love <WH157> thy commandments <WH4687> Above gold <WH2091>, yea <WH6337>, above fine gold.
Therefore I esteem all thy precepts <WH6490> concerning all things to be right <WH3474>; And I hate <WH8130> every false <WH8267> way <WH734>.
PE <WH5715>. Thy testimonies are wonderful <WH6382>; Therefore doth my soul <WH5315> keep them <WH5341>.
The opening <WH6608> of thy words <WH1697> giveth light <WH215>; It giveth understanding <WH995> unto the simple <WH6612>.
I opened <WH6473> wide my mouth <WH6310>, and panted <WH7602>; For I longed <WH2968> for thy commandments <WH4687>.
Turn <WH6437> thee unto me <WH2603>, and have mercy upon me <WH4941>, As thou usest to do unto those that love <WH157> thy name <WH8034>.
Establish <WH3559> my footsteps <WH6471> in thy word <WH565>; And let not any iniquity <WH205> have dominion over me <WH7980>.
Redeem <WH6299> me from the oppression <WH6233> of man <WH120>: So will I observe <WH8104> thy precepts <WH6490>.
Make thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon thy servant <WH5650>; And teach <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
Streams <WH6388> of water <WH4325> run down <WH3381> mine eyes <WH5869>, Because they observe <WH8104> not thy law <WH8451>.
TSADHE <WH6662>. Righteous art thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, And upright <WH3477> are thy judgments <WH4941>.
Thou hast commanded <WH6680> thy testimonies <WH5713> in righteousness <WH6664> And very <WH3966> faithfulness <WH530>.
My zeal <WH7068> hath consumed <WH6789> me <WH6862>, Because mine adversaries have forgotten <WH7911> thy words <WH1697>.
Thy word <WH565> is very <WH3966> pure <WH6884>; Therefore thy servant <WH5650> loveth it <WH157>.
I am small <WH6810> and despised <WH959>; Yet do I not forget <WH7911> thy precepts <WH6490>.
Thy righteousness <WH6666> is an everlasting <WH5769> righteousness <WH6664>, And thy law <WH8451> is truth <WH571>.
Trouble <WH6862> and anguish <WH4689> have taken hold <WH4672> on me <WH4687>; Yet thy commandments are my delight <WH8191>.
Thy testimonies <WH5715> are righteous <WH6664> for ever <WH5769>: Give me understanding <WH995>, and I shall live <WH2421>.
QOPH <WH7121>. I have called with my whole heart <WH3820>; Answer <WH6030> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah: I will keep <WH5341> thy statutes <WH2706>.
I have called <WH7121> unto thee <WH3467>; Save me <WH8104>, And I shall observe thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I anticipated <WH6923> the dawning of the morning <WH5399>, and cried <WH7768>: I hoped <WH3176> in thy words <WH1697>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> anticipated <WH6923> the night-watches <WH821>, That I might meditate <WH7878> on thy word <WH565>.
Hear <WH8085> my voice <WH6963> according unto thy lovingkindness <WH2617>: Quicken <WH2421> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, according to thine ordinances <WH4941>.
They draw nigh <WH7126> that follow <WH7291> after wickedness <WH2154>; They are far <WH7368> from thy law <WH8451>.
Thou art nigh <WH7138>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; And all thy commandments <WH4687> are truth <WH571>.
Of old <WH6924> have I known <WH3045> from thy testimonies <WH5713>, That thou hast founded <WH3245> them for ever <WH5769>.
RESH <WH7200>. Consider mine affliction <WH6040>, and deliver <WH2502> me <WH7911>; For I do not forget thy law <WH8451>.
Plead <WH7378> thou my cause <WH7379>, and redeem <WH1350> me <WH2421>: Quicken me according to thy word <WH565>.
Salvation <WH3444> is far <WH7350> from the wicked <WH7563>; For they seek <WH1875> not thy statutes <WH2706>.
Great <WH7227> are thy tender mercies <WH7356>, O Jehovah <WH3068>: Quicken <WH2421> me according to thine ordinances <WH4941>.
Many <WH7227> are my persecutors <WH7291> and mine adversaries <WH6862>; Yet have I not swerved <WH5186> from thy testimonies <WH5715>.
I beheld <WH7200> the treacherous <WH898>, and was grieved <WH6962>, Because they observe <WH8104> not thy word <WH565>.
Consider <WH7200> how I love <WH157> thy precepts <WH6490>: Quicken <WH2421> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, according to thy lovingkindness <WH2617>.
The sum <WH7218> of thy word <WH1697> is truth <WH571>; And every one of thy righteous <WH6664> ordinances <WH4941> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
SHIN <WH8269>. Princes have persecuted <WH7291> me without a cause <WH2600>; But my heart <WH3820> standeth in awe <WH6342> of thy words <WH1697>.
I rejoice <WH7797> at thy word <WH565>, As one that findeth <WH4672> great <WH7227> spoil <WH7998>.
I hate <WH8130> and abhor <WH8581> falsehood <WH8267>; But thy law <WH8451> do I love <WH157>.
Seven times <WH7651> a day <WH3117> do I praise <WH1984> thee <WH6664>, Because of thy righteous ordinances <WH4941>.
Great <WH7227> peace <WH7965> have they that love <WH157> thy law <WH8451>; And they have no occasion of stumbling <WH4383>.
I have hoped <WH7663> for thy salvation <WH3444>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, And have done <WH6213> thy commandments <WH4687>.
My soul <WH5315> hath observed <WH8104> thy testimonies <WH5713>; And I love <WH157> them exceedingly <WH3966>.
I have observed <WH8104> thy precepts <WH6490> and thy testimonies <WH5713>; For all my ways are before thee <WH1870>.
TAV <WH7440>. Let my cry come near <WH7126> before <WH6440> thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah: Give me understanding <WH995> according to thy word <WH1697>.
Let my supplication <WH8467> come <WH935> before <WH6440> thee <WH5337>: Deliver me according to thy word <WH565>.
Let my lips <WH8193> utter <WH5042> praise <WH8416>; For thou teachest <WH3925> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
Let my tongue <WH3956> sing <WH6030> of thy word <WH565>; For all thy commandments <WH4687> are righteousness <WH6664>.
Let thy hand <WH3027> be ready to help <WH5826> me <WH977>; For I have chosen thy precepts <WH6490>.
I have longed <WH8373> for thy salvation <WH3444>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; And thy law <WH8451> is my delight <WH8191>.
Let my soul <WH5315> live <WH2421>, and it shall praise <WH1984> thee <WH4941>; And let thine ordinances help me <WH5826>.
I have gone astray <WH8582> like a lost <WH6> sheep <WH7716>; Seek <WH1245> thy servant <WH5650>; For I do not forget <WH7911> thy commandments <WH4687>.
